text: ohu venuven puvaru vala sæma deyakma livvemu. eya upadesak ha sæma deyakma vigraha karannak vasayen viya. ebævin eya balavat lesa grahanaya kara ganu. emenma ehi alamkara dæ grahanaya kara ganna men numbe janayata da numba niyoga karanu. papatarayinge nivahana mama numbalata penvami (yæyi ohu pævasuveya)
